participant_1.background:
Soccer is my favorite sport, but playing it in the cold weather can be rough.
i used to be a meat eater but i m now a vegan.
I wake up early, spend time with my family, and work hard to provide for them.
My parents are not supportive of my singing because they want me to have a stable career.
i love to recycle.

participant_2.background:
I like to play outside with my brothers on the Fourth of July.
i work for a small , family owned restaurant.
My longest relationship was four years and I'm not sure if I'm ready for another one.
i have taken formal music lessons since i was 5.
my favorite class is painting.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Hey, mine's going pretty great! What about yours?
It's going well! I'm excited to be chatting with you today.
Me too! I love talking to new people.
Me too! I'm a vegan, have you heard of it before?
I have! I've been thinking about going vegan for a while now. What made you decide to make the switch?
I was really inspired by the documentary "What the Health". It's a really eye-opening film about the health risks of eating meat and dairy.
I'll have to check it out! I have a lot of respect for people who make that kind of change.
Thanks! It's not always easy, but it's the best decision I ever made.
I can imagine! What's your favorite vegan food?
I love tofu scramble and vegan mac and cheese!
Those sound delicious! I'll have to try them sometime.
You should! They're both really easy to make.
Thanks for the tips! I'm sure I'll be seeing you around the vegan community sometime soon.
